title: 2. For the purposes of Schedule 1 of the Patient Safety (Notifiable Incidents
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Patient Safety (Notifiable
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Patient Safety (Notifiable 

Incidents and Open Disclosure) Regulations 2024.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited patient safety (notifiable incident open disclosure) regulation 2024

title: 2. For the purposes of Schedule 1 of the Patient Safety (Notifiable Incidents
heading: 2. For the purposes of Schedule 1 of the Patient Safety (Notifiable Incidents
text_raw:
2. For the purposes of Schedule 1 of the Patient Safety (Notifiable Incidents 

and Open Disclosure) Act 2023 (No. 10 of 2023) and Notifiable Incident— 

(a) 1.10 and 1.11 thereof— 

(i) 

(ii) 

“prescribed birthweight” means a birthweight of not less 
than 2500 grammes; and 

“prescribed gestational age” means a gestational age of at 
least 37 weeks, commencing on the first day of the 37th 
week; 

(b) 1.11 thereof, a “perinatal death” means a death which occurred 

within 7 days of birth. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

1 October, 2024. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 4th October, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [501] 3

title: 2. For the purposes of Schedule 1 of the Patient Safety (Notifiable Incidents
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations define “prescribed birthweight” and “prescribed gestational 
age” for the purposes of Notifiable Incident 1.10 and 1.11 in Schedule 1 of the 
Patient Safety (Notifiable Incidents and Open Disclosure) Act 2023, only. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [501]
